item.title: Integration Testing with Maven, Jetty and Selenium 2
item.description: For the last few days, I was busy with preparing a integration test environment for our PrimeFaces showcase. Showcase project was already a Maven project, so I made a little research about maven phases, maven plugins, Selenium and Jetty and figured out how can I make things work. You can see similar blog posts on Google about the topic. I looked at most of them and they helped me on the way.
